metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29582 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel before 5.17.3, fs/io_uring.c has a use-after-free dueto a race condition in io_uring timeouts. This can be triggered by a localuser who has no access to any user namespace; however, the race conditionperhaps can only be exploited infrequently.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
